artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Thai Silk; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: A top layer of a sequence of five colored silk strips (of "shan"? - amber, olive, rose quartz?, beige, yellow) sewn diagonally and separated by vertical bans of lavender silk machine quilted onto a cottom skrim. The inner layer is a foam padding. Yellow, beige, rust, lavender. Marigold-2
